article_title: Hamas-run health ministry records rise in Gaza death toll.
sentence: The  number  of  people  killed  in  Gaza  since  the  start  of  the  war  has  risen  to  15,899,  the  Hamas-run  health  ministry  there  says.

article_title: Hamas-run health ministry records rise in Gaza death toll.
sentence: Our  colleagues  at  BBC  Verify  previously  analysed  how  the  dead  are  counted  in  Gaza,  which  you  can  read  here  .

article_title: Hamas-run health ministry records rise in Gaza death toll.
sentence: Israel  began  its  offensive  against  Hamas  after  the  attack  on  7  October,  which  saw  Hamas  operatives  cross  the  border  and  kill  1,200  people  -  and  take  240  others  hostage.
